other_tests.findings: Confirmed diagnoses of lipomeningocele and dermoid cyst.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Postoperative course complicated by CSF leakage, which required external ventricular drainage and later an ETV. Ventriculoperitoneal shunt placement resolved clinical complications.

other_tests.findings: Confirmed the diagnoses of lipomeningocele and dermoid cyst.
Continuous monitoring of intracranial pressure remained constantly higher than normal; daily drained CSF was more than 250 ml.
Did not result in control of the CSF fistula.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Subsequent ventriculoperitoneal shunt placement resolved clinical complications.
